last_episode_to_air.name: Time Patrol Bon (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Using everything he's learned as a Time Patrol agent, Bon is determined to stop the Dimension Ball. Will he make it in time before space-time collapses?

name: T・P BON
overview: After Bon accidentally intervenes in a Time Patrol case, he must join Agent Ream in saving innocent lives from the past — while watching history unfold.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When his classmate suffers an untimely death, Bon is whisked away into the dangerous world of time travel. Will he be able to survive history?

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Now an official Time Patrol agent, Bon continues his extraordinary rescue missions through space-time while mentoring his new assistant, Yumiko.

episodes.name: I Won't Be Erased!
episodes.overview: While at his friend's home, Bon Namihira accidentally witnesses time travel in action and finds out that to keep it a secret, he must be erased.

episodes.name: T・P Apprentice
episodes.overview: After narrowly escaping erasure, Bon must learn the ropes of being a Time Patrol agent. His first mission: 1947 Tokyo in the midst of Typhoon Kathleen.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Pyramid
episodes.overview: In his next mission, Bon is off to the very distant past of 2592 B.C. Egypt, where he works with Ream to save the innocent Thoth from being buried alive.

episodes.name: An Ancient Man Crosses the Pacific
episodes.overview: After getting an earful from Ream about flaunting his new gear, Bon and team travel to 800 B.C. where they assist an ancestor's risky sea voyage to Japan.

episodes.name: Witch Hunt
episodes.overview: Bon and Ream go back 350 years, arriving in Southern France to prevent the torture and death of Celine, a potential victim of Europe's witch hunts.

episodes.name: The Mountain of the Roaring White Dragon
episodes.overview: While on a mission in A.D. 628 at the Tian Shan Mountains, Bon realizes that the group they're trailing inspired the epic "Journey to the West" tale

episodes.name: The Dark Labyrinth
episodes.overview: In 1500 B.C. on Crete, Bon and Ream experience the dire consequences of neglecting their Time Boats. Will they be able to save their targets in time?

episodes.name: The Beautiful Girl on the Battlefield
episodes.overview: Tasked with saving only one person during the Battle of Okinawa in 1945, Bon and Ream wrestle with the harsh reality of the Time Patrol's limits.

episodes.name: Riding a Dinosaur on Vacation
episodes.overview: The crew takes a vacation to the late Jurassic period but ends up thwarting a poacher whose unrepentant hunting might threaten all of humanity.

episodes.name: Gunfight Near the O.K. Corral
episodes.overview: Bon and Ream search for clues to their next target's identity in Tombstone, USA, where they must blend in with the 19th-century gunslinging crowd.

episodes.name: The Marathon Battle
episodes.overview: The crew warps to 490 B.C., saving lives at the Battle of Marathon. Later, Bon carelessly changes history and must take the place of an important herald.

episodes.name: Hyperspace Castaway
episodes.overview: Bon and Ream become stranded in the future while on a dangerous mission to rescue a "Time Tripper." Will they be able to find their way back home?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: When his classmate suffers an untimely death, Bon is whisked away into the dangerous world of time travel. Will he be able to survive history?

episodes.name: The Random Murders
episodes.overview: Freshly promoted, Bon takes on the task of saving someone from a neighborhood serial killer. But problems arise when he becomes the suspect.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice to Chacmool
episodes.overview: Eager to be a good mentor, Bon takes Yumiko on her first mission to Chichén Itzá in 1978. Will Bon’s new assistant make a good agent — or stir up trouble?

episodes.name: The Heike Fugitive
episodes.overview: Bon and Yumiko travel to the Kanmon Straits in 1185 Japan, where they must rescue and protect a survivor of the Heike clan from being hunted down.

episodes.name: The Sumerian Boy
episodes.overview: In 3319 B.C. Sumer, a young boy develops the beginnings of an ancient writing system — but his village is under threat from raiders and needs protection.

episodes.name: The First American
episodes.overview: Bon and Yumiko travel over 35,000 years back to the desolate landscape of Beringia to prevent a lone hunter from freezing to death on his trek east.

episodes.name: The T・P Agent's Crime
episodes.overview: When a rogue Time Patrol agent murders someone, Bon and Yumiko are determined to stop the crime before it happens and uncover their colleague's motives.

episodes.name: The Beast Delb
episodes.overview: The crew's next mission takes place 21,000 years ago in Southern France where their target is a Cro-Magnon boy who has been cast out from his village.

episodes.name: The Day Troy Fell
episodes.overview: After Yumiko gets a promotion, the crew travels to 1229 B.C. Troy, to save their target. Bon's pride gets in the way when Yumiko comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: The Grim Reaper's Horde
episodes.overview: The crew saves an older man in 14th-century France from the plague. Later, after learning that he's still in danger, they launch another rescue mission.

episodes.name: The Wrath of the Gods
episodes.overview: After saving Lazarus in A.D. 79, Bon and Yumiko learn their target faces a harsher fate — death by gladiator fight or the wrath of Mount Vesuvius.

episodes.name: The Ruins Submerged in Rain (1)
episodes.overview: Bon receives terrible news about Agent Ream but must focus on his next mission: rescuing a young man from a sudden flood in 2400 B.C. Mohenjo-daro.

episodes.name: Time Patrol Bon (2)
episodes.overview: Using everything he's learned as a Time Patrol agent, Bon is determined to stop the Dimension Ball. Will he make it in time before space-time collapses?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Now an official Time Patrol agent, Bon continues his extraordinary rescue missions through space-time while mentoring his new assistant, Yumiko.
